name: CricMax
description: We are here to make cricket possible.
overview:
We are CricMax and we are here to make cricket possible for you in USA. CricMax is an entity built and created for all cricket loving people. Whether, you are a beginner, skilled or an expert cricketer; CricMax is here to make it easy for you.

Cricket Equipments At CricMax - we make it easier for cricketers to buy and select cricket equipment. We are not just here to sell the cricket equipment, but our goal is to be with you throughout your cricketing tenure. We make it easier for you to select the product which would suit you, keep updated with the latest cricket equipment from different brands. We thrive on the customer retention and customer contentment.

Coaching At CricMax, we have created a network of great coaches of Cricket. These coaches don’t just make sure that our second generation learns cricket but they make sure that cricket is enjoyed, which is the main reason CricMax Coaching Camps are becoming more popular.

Tournaments At CricMax, we believe in taking a step further and going that extra mile. Recently, CricMax organized a Youth Tournament and CricMax was proud, not just in bringing the second generation together with cricket but also challenging them to go further. CricMax will keep pursuing that extra mile and hence, CricMax brings a tour to England. We are providing an opportunity to experience the Real Cricket from the country where Gentleman’s Game begun.

We at CricMax announce that “Cricket is Possible” and here we are to “Make it Easier”
